explains: n. （心理）自我概念，自我评估

sentences.en: This is part of the process of self-validation whereby we employ self-disclosures to seek support for our self-concept.
sentences.cn: 这是自我验证过程的一部分，我们通过自我表露来寻求对自我概念的支持。

sentences.en: Talking with parents about the past may enhance the development of the self-concept, for example, as well as help the child understand what it means to "remember".
sentences.cn: 例如，与父母谈论过去可以促进自我概念的发展，也可以帮助孩子理解“记住”的含义。

sentences.en: Case studies of children who are isolated from others reveal that they lack a firm self-concept, and their mental and psychological development is severely hindered by lack of language.
sentences.cn: 对孤立儿童的个案研究表明，他们缺乏坚定的自我概念，而其语言能力的缺乏严重阻碍了他们的智力和心理发展。
